commentThread.commentText: Racism is stupid and people who perpetuate or are entertained by racist behavior are also stupid. Additionally, this video does not represent the American perspective of Indians in America - AT ALL! Indians in America can say whatever they like because they have no sway in America. No one cares what they say or think because they are inconsequential in terms of American culture. Indians are not trend-setters in America and there are very few Indians leading in any major industry of the US, other than in IT and some areas of science and/or medicine. Additionally, Americans do not see Indians as the "in the middle" race in the US. Most Americans see Latinos as the "in the middle " race of America. Indians have designated themselves as "brown people", but Americans refer to Indians as Indian. When Americans use the term "brown people", they are referring to ALL people of color . . Black, Hispa nic, Indian, Middle-Eastern, etc. - this term is typically used by Americans in conversations about diversity, to cover all people of color. I felt the need to clarify these points, but the bottom line is that vi ewing racism as funny is IGNORANT! Grow up, people!!
